designing.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> Okey I was chatting with rAuq about other things that could help to 
> keep this RPG alive. Well, when a website dies when the webmaster 
stops 
> updating the website... right? What if we (RPGERs) do a temporary 
website 
> for NBW... but instead exist one webmaster, we'll have more. Then, 
if 
> one of webmasters can't work on the website (or worst: quit) for a 
> while, the others can keep the site running and updating it. If one 
of 
> webmasters quits,  the others webmasters chooses an other member and 
train 
> him/her, and give that person the passwords and needed information.
> 
> When the website has to be updated, the webmasters share the job, 
and 
> it will go much faster, since several people are doing it.
> 
> What do you think?
> 
> Airly
>
